metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3842 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflows in libeffects in the Audio Policy Service in mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48I allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted application, aka internal bug 21953516.

notes.Note: jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
